# Amit Divekar - Full-Stack Software Engineer Portfolio
> A professional portfolio showcasing Full-Stack Software Engineering expertise in Cloud Architecture, DevOps, AI solutions, and modern web development.

## About
- [Home](https://amitdevx.tech): Professional introduction and hero section.
- [About Me](https://amitdevx.tech/#about): Background, education at Savitribai Phule Pune University (CGPA 8.36/10), and personal expertise overview.
- [Resume/CV](https://amitdevx.tech/cv): Complete professional credentials, qualifications, and downloadable resume.

## Projects
- [SchemaSense AI](https://schemasense.amitdevx.tech): AI-powered database documentation platform. Auto-generates schema docs, maps table relationships, and provides a real-time chat interface powered by DeepSeek-V3. Built with Next.js, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and intelligent caching. [Source Code](https://github.com/amitdevx/schemasense)
- [Professor Profiler](https://github.com/amitdevx/Professor_Profiler): Hierarchical multi-agent system that reverse-engineers exam papers to decode professor psychology and generate optimized study strategies. Built with Python and Google Gemini. [Documentation](https://deepwiki.com/amitdevx/Professor_Profiler)
- [Eatinformed](https://eatinformed.amitdevx.tech): AI-driven nutrition analysis from food label images, built with Next.js, Genkit, and Google Gemini.
- [2FA Password Protector](https://github.com/amitdevx): Flask-based three-layer authentication system with login, PIN, and TOTP 2FA.
- [Cloud File Uploader](https://github.com/amitdevx/FileFlow): Secure cloud file storage system built with Node.js and SQLite.
- [Anime Viewing Platform](https://github.com/amitdevx/anime-view-site): Responsive Flask-based streaming website with dynamic content loading.

## Professional Experience
- [Experience](https://amitdevx.tech/#experience): Virtual Experience programs at Electronic Arts (EA) and Accenture UK.
- [Skills & Expertise](https://amitdevx.tech/#skills): AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, React, Next.js, Python, FastAPI, Node.js, TypeScript, and AI/ML.
- [Certifications](https://amitdevx.tech/#certifications): Microsoft Cybersecurity, Google Cloud Security, EA Software Engineering, Accenture Developer, GeeksforGeeks Networking.

## Technical Blog
- [All Blog Posts](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs): In-depth technical articles on software engineering, DevOps, and AI.
- [SchemaSense: AI-Powered Database Documentation](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/schemasense): How I built an intelligent database documentation platform using Next.js, FastAPI, and DeepSeek-V3.
- [Reverse-Engineering Exams: Professor Profiler](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/professor-profiler): Building a hierarchical multi-agent system with Google Gemini.
- [Open-Source AI Tools for Agentic AI in 2026](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/open-source-ai-tools-2026): Top open-source frameworks for building autonomous agents.
- [Python Functions, Iterators & Generators](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/python-functions-iterators-generators): Core functional programming concepts and production-ready patterns.
- [Mastering Pandas DataFrame Operations](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/pandas-dataframe-operations): Comprehensive guide to Pandas DataFrames.
- [Reddit API and JSON for AI Training](https://amitdevx.tech/blogs/reddit-api-json): Accessing Reddit data as JSON for data analysis and AI training.

## Key Expertise
- Cloud Platforms: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure
- DevOps & Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, GitHub Actions
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Python, FastAPI, Flask
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQLite, SQL
- AI & ML: DeepSeek, Google Gemini, OpenRouter, Multi-Agent Systems
